text: I had an excellent experience with Total Care Restoration, and I highly recommend their services! Hector and Junior came to our home and were incredibly professional, neat, and courteous. They took great care to protect our floors with extra coverings and padded protection, ensuring no mud or mess was tracked through the house. They efficiently set up three machines in my kitchen to address moisture issues, and their attention to detail was impressive. Both Hector and Junior were spectacular to work with, and their professionalism made the process stress-free. Thank you, Total Care Restoration, for a job well done! I‚Äôd confidently recommend this company to anyone in need of restoration services.

text: Had a major leak from the unit above, and the initial team brought in wasn‚Äôt proactive. I called Zack at Total Care, and they showed up immediately. text:
Jesus and Luis picked up the water restoration equipment this morning. These 2 gentlemen went out of their way to help me. Last week they helped me move items that had been stored in the shed after the flood. Today, these gentlemen helped me move the remainder of the flood items from the shed. They also moved an outdoor loveseat as well as two outdoor arm chairs from the front patio to the shed.
Realizing both my age and being alone, Jesus and Luis took the time to help me.
I hope management at TOTAL CARE RESTORATION is aware of both the professionalism and compassion that is exhibited by these employees. I would recommend this company with the highest regard based on your employees alone, especially these two individuals.
As an addendum to this recommendation, I wish to add the following. After the initial mold remediation was completed by other team members, 2 of the areas having mold failed to pass the clearance test. Again, Luis and Jesus were sent to my home. They resprayed and fogged the 2 rooms in question with such due diligence, I know with certainty all the mold has now been eradicated!  This Company follows through until everything is perfect as witnessed by all who are employed by them, especially Luis and Jesus.

Thank you,
Kathleen Terrell

text: After a recommendation from a neighbor, I called to make an appointment on Friday, 1/22/2021. I wanted to check and see if I had mold in my walls from an A/C leak. I was able to secure an appointment for the next day between 11AM and Noon. Steve Martinez called at 10:45 AM and informed me he was on his way. He arrived at 11AM, very polite and professional. He checked the area that I suspected had mold and gave me the all clear. There was no charge for the inspection, and he let me know to call if I had any more concerns in the future. Living in South Florida you always have your doubts about service companies telling you that there is a problem when none exists. Total Care Restoration "restored" my faith in companies that come highly recommended, like Total Care Restoration did. Thank you Total Care, and Steve Martinez!

text: Initial service was very good.  Follow up - not so great and price charged to my insurance company was not even in the ballpark of what they told me.  I truly believe that if you do right by people (insurance or not) that the referrals and business will come back to you.  Plus  the charge to my insurance company of $1000 for a mold test, for a  guy that was here for 30 mins, assessing the water damage is dishonest.
name: TJL

text: I had a very poor experience with this company.  My three issues were communication, punctuality, and price.  The salesman, who was supposed to be the main point of contact, never explained what the process was going to be, even after my repeated requests to let me know what the next steps were going to be.  We were caught off guard on several occasions regarding the process and how it was going to affect us.  Regarding punctuality, rarely did the employees arrive at the appointment time.  One time, they were 5 hours late.  Another time 2 hours.  Regarding price, the company charges very high prices for the services provided, especially the water removal.  All that was provided were some very loud fans to try to dry the cabinets.  I cannot recommend the company at all.
name: Christina Pancier

text: What kind of company asks you do to a review at the BEGINNING of a project? MAYBE they are hoping people wont update their review to 1 star??? They could simply say "Hey, wright a review please", but literally "put these names in your review Hector, Alexander, Junior, Louis, Jesus and Maria." I wrote all the names down thinking WOW that's ballzy. This company took advantage of my landlord who lives in Europe, knowing very well she is unable to see their poor work. The people who schedule the technicians don't communicate properly and then the technicians do not show up on time. There was a FLOOD and all they did was blow hot air with big noisy fans. Now that I'm posting this I see I'm not the only customer with complaints about Google Reviews. Alexander, Junior, Louis, Jesus and Maria, watch out for your co-worker Hector as he is who asked me to write your names down.....SKETCHY
name: Shira Heby

text:
The team that arrived, Maria, Jesus & Kevin were amazing, efficient & very pleasant. Kevin, the supv, welcomed every question with patience & responded in detail. I trust them & recommend this team without reservation.

I regrettably am compelled to edit my review of Total Care Restoration. My original review was requested (by Kevin) and posted at the start of the project, which lasted 14 days!   Within that 14-day period there were several inconsistencies big and small, including the (verbal) estimate I received from Kevin on day one, an important factor in my decision to hire this contractor. The estimate was between $1K- $3k, but the actual invoice was a little over $4K.  When equipment pick-ups were scheduled, I had to insist that moisture levels be verified before removing the equipment. I discovered days later that important appliances were unplugged without any notice, like my washing machine and floor lamps. None of this deserves a 5-star rating. In fairness, I should also recognize (2) exceptional workers, Yunior and Luis. They were helpful, professional and concerned about the overall success of my project. Please think twice before hiring Total Care Restoration.
name: Gale S

text:
This company sucks! They bill your insurance for work they did not do. Please be sure to ask for a copy of the invoice that was bill to your insurance company

---

No  I didn't mix you guys up. I just don't use my name in the email. It's definitely you guys. People  beware of this company!
name: Cersi uno

text: This company is sketchy at best. They put up a front to get inflated Google reviews, but customer service is awful, and communication is terrible. They do not return your calls or emails, and as others have said, they are not transparent about quotes and pricing. do not trust the 4.9 rating and look elsewhere.
name: Adam D.

text: On a Tuesday night I had a small toilet leak. By Wednesday morning I called a plumber. The plumber arrived around 4pm. A few mins after the plumber arrived, a guy from this company also arrived. He knew the plumber and they greeted each other and spoke. I never called this company so I‚Äôm assuming they‚Äôre in partnership with the plumbing company. This company came to my home without me calling them to seek money out of my insurance. I was sold on a promise that my insurance would fix and pay for any damages, at minimum $10k.  He then sent two guys to my home the next following afternoon, Thursday 4pm (48 hours after the toilet leak) and placed two fans in my home and removed one small baseboard about 2 ft long out the bathroom. That‚Äôs it!!! Now they‚Äôre trying to have me pay about $3k‚Ä¶ My insurance even realized the damages were not worth that cost. This company is a fraud. They seeked out a young single mom, he wouldn‚Äôt have done this if I was a man. The email stated they will lower the amount, but yet they continue sending me bills for the full price. When you call their office, they forward you to the ‚Äúoffice manager‚Äù but it‚Äôs always going to voicemail.
name: G Clermont

text: One of the workers was smoking outside of the establishment in uniform.
name: James Moreira
